creator: Minec PE Addons
descriptionHtml:
The world of Pocket Edition is simply infinite. And any experienced player has already managed to make sure of this, constantly exploring the huge cubic space mcpe Bedrock. After all, all the travel opens up to you unexplored worlds that are inhabited by unusual mobs, as well as give you another victory and with them - vivid emotions, valuable experience and no less valuable items.

But mcpe Bedrock is full of surprises and there are parallel dimensions or worlds in addition to the main world. There are at least two dimensions of Pocket Edition. These are the underworld or, in other words, hell and the heavenly dimension - paradise. Access to each dimension opens special portals heaven in minecraft and hell.

Heaven portal mod for minecraft pe and will open the door to the heavenly worlds, which are by far the least explored by the players. It's only worth imagining that the addon portals of heaven in minecraft will make you one of the first to visit and truly explore the dimensions of paradise!

Before you succumb to the call of adventure, however, you'll need to complete a little challenge of mods, where invariably your wits will bail you out. The test is to build yourself that very portal heaven minecraft. But, we assure you - it's not a difficult task. You will need some valuable items of mods for this process. The first item is a bucket of water, and the second item is eight blocks of lightstone from addons. You should place all the items of mods in the right order and the portal heaven minecraft will open its gates to another dimension mcpe Bedrock.

The world of paradise will conquer you with its beauty! It is filled with soft sunlight and airy clouds, a space portal heaven minecraft, in which truly heavenly flying islands - small and large - are found. It seems that every item in this world is emitting the light!

But do not let your guard down and expect that the heaven portal mod for minecraft pe will take you to a world full of peace and safety. You are also lurking there the sinister inhabitants of heaven - mobs from addons. No earthly mob can compare to the representatives of the heavenly universe. Mobs from addons are noted for their strength, dexterity and cunning. Each mob has unique abilities. Fierce battles await you, because each mob defends its territory from invasion.

The addon portals of heaven in minecraft gives just limitless possibilities and discoveries. We are sure that you will have fun and unforgettable time with your favorite game.

The heaven portal mod for minecraft pe is an official Pocket Edition app. Addon is not supported and not approved by Mojang.
